oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Commemorative medallion for the second reunion of the 30th Division
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This medallion was given to James Johnston, who attended the second reunion of the 30th Division held in Asheville, North Carolina. The reunion was held on the 1-year anniversary of the breaking of the Hindenburg Line. The medal features the Old Hickory division insignia. On the reserve side is an Still Image of the North Carolina mountains with the text City of Asheville, North Carolina. James Johnston served in HQ Co., Ord. Corps, attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div.
